name: Butter Crab
description: A grilled crab dish. Appropriate heat control has allowed the crab meat to stay moist and fatty. The butter has seeped into the crab meat, producing an aroma that has people salivating even from afar.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Butter Crab
suspicious.description: A grilled crab dish. The crab legs are still cold, and have a raw, salty flavor to them, almost as if one were being force-fed some seawater.
suspicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 215 and healing effects by 6% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

normal.name: Butter Crab
normal.description: A grilled crab dish. Appropriate heat control has allowed the crab meat to stay moist and fatty. The butter has seeped into the crab meat, producing an aroma that has people salivating even from afar.
normal.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 261 and healing effects by 8% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).

delicious.name: Delicious Butter Crab
delicious.description: A grilled crab dish. The butter-infused crab legs have a rich aroma that washes over the tastes buds so seductively that before you know it, you've eaten it all, and are left sipping at the dregs of butter in the crab's shell, hoping to recapture a fragment of the dish's beauty.
delicious.effect: Increases all party members' DEF by 308 and healing effects by 10% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
